feature.description:
add a new feature to your space
use command desc space to list all features available

args.name: feature
args.desc:
a variable name of a json object representing your feature.
Example: { feature: 'storage', name: '2ndary-storage', provider: 's3', spec: { your s3 credentials } }

secrets.description: add new secrets to the space

args.name: name
args.desc: the name identifier of the secrets
